item.description:
Boston Fashion Industry Meetup is a focal point for the fashion industry in the Northeast, with people coming to Meetups or asking for information - from New York, Connecticut, New Hampshire, Rhode Island. We have great networking with diverse fashion people attaining benefits from one another. There are experts giving advice in every aspect of the industry, and some are continually creating innovative projects for us to work on collaboratively to become successful. RSVP our next Meetup, and be sure to honor your comittment to come. We want to meet all of you, and see what we can do to help one another succeed in a sometimes difficult industry.

Please make sure you give us your profile. It is very important in order to classify you according to your fashion products, servives or even your aspirations. There are many people looking for fashion people in all aspects of the industry. Let them know what you do so they can find you.

For more information, see http://www.shirleywil...
item.name: The Boston Fashion Industry July Meetup
